
# Debian Bullseye Runtime dependencies
## Stable repos
```
libegl1
libgl1
libgles1
libgles2
libfontconfig1
libgmp10
libhogweed6
libbinutils
libx11-6
libxfixes3
libxi6
libxinerama1
libxss1
libxcursor1
libxpresent1
fonts-dejavu-core
```

### Wayland
```
libxkbcommon0
libwayland-bin
wayland-protocols
```
